content: the woven warmth crochet mittens are part of a fun warm and cozy crochet pattern set made with **red heart super saver brushed** https //www yarnspirations com/products/red-heart-super-saver-brushed-yarn &utm_source=influencer_moogly&utm_medium=blog&utm_campaign=2024_9_wovenwarmth inspired by warm up america s drive to collect hats scarves and mittens this autumn this set of patterns features a brand-new crochet stitch and lots of love for the mittens i wanted to stay practical - so the fun woven stitches are only featured as an *optional* fold up cuff you can make these mittens plain - without the decorative cuff - to match any crochet hat and scarf set these patterns are all free on moogly and for the month of september 2024 all the pdfs are only $3 33 making it only $9 99 for the full set
